loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a 60-year-old married woman with four grown-up children. At her age, she is still strong enough to fulfill the needs of her family. Gloria manages a store in front of their house. She is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy additional products such as canned goods, snack foods, and drinks for her store.

In the future, she hopes that her business will expand to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snack foods and drinks for her store.

loans.name: Tiberio Antonio

texts.es:
Tiberio es una persona muy trabajadora que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida. Tiberio tiene 1 hijo de 15 años a quien su madre abandonó hace un tiempo, por lo que todas las responsabilidades han quedado sobre Tiberio y por tanto debe garantizar siempre el sustento necesario para su hijo. Tiberio tiene su negocio de venta de frutas desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, el cual ha logrado acreditar ante sus clientes gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos. Gracias a este negocio, tiene la posibilidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, por lo que siempre se ha esforzado por que este crezca y cada vez sus ventas aumenten considerablemente. Debido a la escasez de frutas que hay en su región, Tiberio debe traer estas frutas de otras regiones, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de frutas las cuales debe conseguir en otras regiones debido a la escasez de frutas en su región.

Tiberio de esta manera podrá seguir teniendo su negocio y podrá seguir saliendo adelante junto con su hijo. Además, así podrá seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar y poco a poco irá cumpliendo el sueño de tener su casa propia y un local para su negocio.
texts.en:
Tiberio is a hardworking individual who has had to overcome great adversities in his life. He has a 15-year-old son whose mother abandoned them some time ago, so he is fully responsible for always making sure that his son has everything he needs. Tiberio has managed a fruit business for approximately 15 years. He has been able to gain customers thanks to the good quality of his products. Through this business, he has been able to generate the necessary income to maintain his household expenses. For this reason, he always strives to grow and his sales increase considerably each time. There is currently a shortage of fruits in the region, so he must have fruit shipped in from other areas. Tiberio is seeking this opportunity to access a loan so that he can buy fruit from other regions because of the local shortage.

Tiberio would like to continue his business so that he and his son can keep moving forward. He also would like to continue generating needed household income and gradually fulfill his dream of owning a home and a shop for his business.

loans.use: to buy fruits.

loans.name: Nubia

texts.es:
Nubia ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, y gracias a sus ganas de trabajar a podido salir adelante y seguir progresando junto a su familia. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 8 hijos, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica para su sostenimiento, Nubia se vio en la obligación de generar grandes ingresos para poder sostener su hogar. Fue así como una amiga le enseñó a preparar ensaladas y luego salían y las vendían en las calles de su municipio; de esta manera generaban los ingresos para su hogar y poco a poco el negocio iba creciendo y captando cada vez más clientes. Actualmente Nubia sigue trabajando en este negocio y sigue generando los ingresos que requiere para el sostenimiento de su hogar, y gracias a que ha conseguido gran variedad de clientes en todos los sectores de su municipio, busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una moto con la cual pueda repartir sus productos entre todos los clientes de su municipio.

De esta manera tendrá la oportunidad de seguir vendiendo sus productos a más clientes y seguir ofreciendo en su hogar los ingresos necesarios. Nubia sueña con tener un gran negocio y con poder ofrecer a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Nubia has had to overcome great adversities that she has encountered in her life.  Thanks to her great desire to work, she has been able to get ahead and continue advancing with her family.  She is the single mother of her eight children.  Their father abandoned them some time ago without any financial contribution for their maintenance.  Nubia was obligated to generate a lot of income in order to be able to support her household.

That’s how it was when a friend taught her how to make salads.  They then went out and sold them on the streets of her municipality.  This way she generated income for her household.  Little by little the business was growing and gaining more customers every day. 

Nubia continues working in this business, and she continues generating the income needed to support her household.  She is grateful that she has gotten a great variety of customers in all of the areas of her municipality.

She is seeking a loan to buy a motorcycle, which she would use to deliver her products to all of her customers in her municipality.  This way she will continue providing her household with the needed income.

Nubia dreams of having a large business and being able to offer her children a better quality of life and greater financial opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle, which she would use to deliver her products to all of her customers in her municipality.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en: A very strong and determined person from the village of Alibagu, Estrella is married and has three grown children. She has managed a community-based store for three years. Estrella is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy spices, noodles, coffee, milk, and bread for her store. In the future, Estrella hopes that her business expands. She wants to build a store in front of her house so that she can provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy spices, noodles, coffee, milk and bread for her store

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es:
Omar aprendió la actividad del reciclaje gracias a sus padres que siempre se dedicaron a esta actividad, por lo que ha tenido una gran experiencia en este trabajo y esto le ha permitido salir adelante. Omar se encuentra separado de la madre de sus 3 hijos, por lo que debe garantizar el sostenimiento de los gastos de su familia, y para esto trabaja fuertemente en su negocio. Omar tiene la actividad del reciclaje como una gran fuente de ingresos y gracias a esto ha podido salir adelante llevando a cabo esta actividad en la que tiene gran experiencia. Con el ánimo de acceder a la compra de algunos materiales, Omar busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de reciclaje los cuales se los están ofreciendo a un muy bajo precio.

De esta manera, Omar podrá acceder a estos productos y aumentar su margen de ganancia gracias al bajo costo que se los están vendiendo. Además, Omar espera que sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida con mayores ingresos y por esto espera seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Omar learned the recycling trade from his parents, who were always engaged in this type of business. He has extensive experience in this line of work, which has allowed him to succeed. Omar is separated from the mother of his three children, so he is responsible for maintaining the expenses of his family. For this reason, he works hard in his business. Omar's recycling business is a major source of income and he has been able to get ahead due to his great experience. He is eager to purchase some more materials, so Omar is taking this opportunity to access a loan for acquiring recyclable products that are being offered at a very low price.

By acquiring these products, Omar will increase his profit margin because of the low price that he is paying. He also hopes that continued growth and more income will result in his children having a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy recyclable materials.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en: Violeta is 48 years old and married to Eduardo, they are from the village of Alibagu. She is a hardworking mother and is self-employed; she manages a store located in front of their house. Violeta is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy items for her store; the additional income earned will help meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, spices, drinks and canned goods for the store she manages.

loans.name: Mork

texts.en: Mork is 55 years old and is married with 4 children, all of whom are married. Mork lives in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province, working in the business of cultivating rice. She has been in this business for many years. Mork's 56-year-old husband generates income by providing transportation service to local people using a horse pulled trailer. Recently, he has encountered difficulties in providing his service because his horse is getting older and has difficulty pulling the trailer. To solve the problem, Mork would like to seek for a loan from HKL for the fourth time to buy a young horse for her husband to use in his transportation service business. Mork hopes that this loan will help sustain her living situation.

loans.use: to buy a young horse for her husband to use in his transportation service business.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana, de 53 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa con muchas ganas de salir adelante.  Es conviviente con Juan quien se dedica a la construcción civil, fruto de esa unión tuvieron 4 hijos. Vive en compañía de su pareja y 2 hijos Percy de 30 y Juan de 28 años de edad, habitando en su propia casa  que compró con mucho esfuerzo. La actividad que realiza Ana, es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, pescados frescos y plátanos, para eso instala todos los días muy temprano una mesa en el frontis de su casa, atendiendo a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus propios vecinos. Se inicio  hace más de 20 años con un capital propio y luego fue creciendo con préstamos de MFP, lleva en ese negocio contando con la ayuda de su esposo en sus ratos libres y de descanso.
Considera rentable su negocio, pues le compran sus productos llegando a acabar todo lo que oferta.
Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos, así como el poder conocer otros lugares y nuevas personas además de ver crecer su negocio a base de su esfuerzo. No le gusta cuando llueve muy constante ya que dificulta el libre transito malogrando los accesos a su casa y le ventas bajan. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 13 con la institución MFP, y espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además comenta sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo unido ya que ha encontrado apoyo por parte de todos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en compra de mercaderías como abarrotes a precio por mayor para así tener mayores ganancias. También comprará pescados y plátanos ya que sus precios están en alza dejándole mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Ana, age 53, is a hardworking and earnest woman who greatly wants to succeed. She is in a common-law relationship with Juan, who is in the construction business. They have four children. Ana lives with her partner and two of her children: Percy (age 30) and Juan (age 28). They live in their own home, which they purchased with great effort. Ana has a business of selling groceries, fresh fish, and bananas. Every morning, Ana starts early by setting everything out on a table in front of her home. She attends to her customers, who are mostly neighbors. Ana started her business 20 years ago with her own capital, but she eventually kept growing as a result of the loans from MFP. She manages her business with the help of her husband when he has free time and on his days off.

Ana considers her business to be profitable because her customers buy everything that she offers. She enjoys her business because it enables her to generate an income to cover her expenses. Ana has made the effort to travel to other places and meet new people, which will help grow her business. She does not like the constant rains because they make it difficult for people to reach her house. Her sales suffer as a result.

This will be her 13th loan with the MFP organization. Ana hopes to receive assistance so that she can continue with her goals. She also feels comfortable working with her Communal Bank because she considers her group to be unified and supportive of all its members. The amount of 1,000 PEN that she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of groceries at a wholesale price so that she can earn more income. She will also buy fish and bananas to help generate more revenue since the prices of those products are also rising.

loans.use: to buy fish, bananas, and groceries.

loans.name: Luz Maryori

texts.es:
Luz Maryori ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y seguir luchando para progresar. Hace unos años salió del país en busca de mejores oportunidades económicas, pero debido a las crisis que se presentaron en los últimos años en los países europeos se vio en la obligación de regresar a su país y comenzar nuevamente en la búsqueda de su progreso económico. Fue así como comenzó su negocio de venta de insumos para la confección donde ofrece los insumos básicos como hilos, agujas, entre otros. Con este negocio, el cual fue abierto hace muy poco tiempo, puede generar los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento y poder contribuir para que su madre tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, Luz Maryori busca que un préstamo le permita comprar surtido de insumos como agujas, hilos, entre otros para su negocio y así poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.

De esta manera su negocio será más atractivo para los clientes y así aumentará sus ventas considerablemente. Además, podrá seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida y su familia tendrá acceso a mejores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Luz Maryori has had to go through many adversities in her life.  However, she’s had the strength to continue forward striving to make progress.  A few years ago she went abroad in search of better economic opportunities but due to the crisis that arose the last few years in European countries she was forced to return to her country and start once more to look for economic progress.  

This was how she started a business selling dressmaking supplies; she sells basic supplies like needles and thread among others.  With this business which she opened a short time ago she is able to generate income needed to support herself and to be able to contribute towards her mother’s having a better quality of life.

Because she set the business up with very little capital, Luz Maryori is seeking a loan to buy supplies like needles and thread among others for her business so that she can offer her customers a wider variety of products.

In this way her business will be more attractive to customers and her sales will increase considerably.  In addition, she will be able to continue having a good quality of life and her family will have access to better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy supplies like needles and thread among others.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 37 years old and is married to a responsible farmer. The couple is thankful for having been blessed with four school-aged children. To earn a living, Norma keeps busy managing their sari-sari (convenience) store business. She has been in business for over two years and usually earns about PHP 300 each day.

Currently, Norma is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 25,000 to buy additional grocery items to resell such as, canned goods, assorted breads, noodles, soft-drinks and kitchen items. She hopes to grow and expand her business, to continue sending her children to school and to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items to resell such as canned goods, assorted breads, noodles, soft-drinks and kitchen items.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 40 years old, married, and has four children who attend school.  Farming has been the main source of income for Gemma's family. Her husband is the in charge in cultivating and maintaining their corn field. She and her husband perform other farming activities to minimize their expenses.

Gemma is requesting a loan for 42,000 PHP, which she will use to buy fertilizer to improve the growth of her corn crops.  She aims to increase her income due to the high cost of basic commodities, high price of livestock feeds, and school fees of their children. She hopes that the loan will help sustain all their daily needs, support her children's education, and provide the daily needs of her hog raising business.

Gemma helps her husband in running their farming business so that they will have a greater income. Aside from farming, she also raises hogs to obtain an extra income for family. She knows that through the generated income from her farming and hog raising business she can uplift her family status out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her agricultural business.

loans.name: Pum

texts.en:
Pum is 38 years old and is a hardworking mother living in Kampong Chhnang province. She is involved in the business of making things from clay. She makes many types of containers like ceramic pots, jars, and cooking tools. She typically earns approximately 2.50 USD per day from this business. She is responsible for a school-age child.

For additional income, Pum decided to take out a loan of 1,000,000 KHR to purchase piglets to raise. She hopes she is able to make a good income from this investment and provide her child with a good education. This will be her third loan from HKL. She has been an honest client with our firm for more than three years and has already paid off her previous loans successfully.

loans.use: to purchase piglets

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes enjoys her daily activities. Before she starts her routine, she first seeks God because, through Him, she believes she can make all things possible. Agnes is married to Julito, a tricycle driver. They have been blessed with four children. All of them are grown, married, and have their own families.

Agnes owns and has operated her one hectare of cornfield for 27 years. She is thankful because she was able to support her children's education through the income she generated from her farming business. Agnes would like to improve her farming business especially because she is getting older.

Agnes also earns additional income from her hog-raising business. She is currently raising five hogs and one sow. According to her, the income she generates from farming is no longer sufficient due to the high cost of livestock feed and expensive basic commodities. For her to obtain greater profit from her agricultural business she is requesting additional capital amounting to 27,000 PHP. She will use the loan to buy fertilizer and certified seeds to replant her farm land. She hopes to have a plentiful harvest this next harvesting season. She hopes that everything will have a fruitful outcome.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and certified seeds

loans.name: Freddie

texts.en:
Freddie works hard in order to earn a living. He is 36 years old, married, and has six children. His eldest child has finished his studies, while four others are still studying. The youngest is still an infant.

Freddie is grateful because through his farming business, he is able to take care of their basic needs and send his children to school. He aims to increase his income due to the large number of people in his household. To make this goal a reality, he is asking for financial assistance from Kiva lenders through the ASKI microfinance institution. He is requesting a loan of 21,000 PHP. He will use this amount to buy fertilizer and certified seeds to improve his corn crops and replant his two hectares of farm land. He believes that this amount will have a great impact on his hopes for his children and for improving their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and certified seed for his farming business

loans.name: Luz Andrea

texts.es:
Luz Andrea es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de sus 2 hijos de 1 y 4 años de edad, pues su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo sin hacer alguna contribución económica. Anteriormente trabajaba como operaria en una empresa de confecciones, pero al sentir que su trabajo era muy mal remunerado, decidió montar su propio taller de confección desde su casa con el ánimo de generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Fue así como montó desde su casa un taller de confección en el cual ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros y donde al mismo tiempo puede estar al cuidado de sus hijos. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, ha logrado captar un gran número de clientes, y es por esto que actualmente su capacidad de producción es inferior a los pedidos que hacen sus clientes de sus servicios. Es por esto que Luz Andrea busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina industrial para la confección en su taller y así aumentar la capacidad de producción para poder responder a todos los pedidos que hacen sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá tener mayores ventas y por ende mayores ingresos, y con los cuales podrá ofrecer a sus 2 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y el acceso a una buena educación. Luz Andrea sueña con tener un gran taller donde pueda generar empleo para los más necesitados y desde el cual pueda ofrecer una estabilidad económica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz Andrea is a single mother head of household to her two children who are 1 and 4 years old because their father abandoned them some time ago without making any economic contributions.  She used to work as an employee at a dressmaking firm but feeling that her work was poorly paid she decided to set up her own dressmaking workshop at home aiming at generating higher income to support her home.

This is how she set up her dressmaking shop where she offers service to third persons and has managed to capture a large number of customers so now her production is insufficient to cover customer demand which is why Luz Andrea is looking for a loan to buy an industrial sewing machine for her workshop to increase production capacity and be able to fill all the orders her customers place.

In this way she will be able to have higher sales and thus higher income that she can use to provide her two minor children with a better quality of life and access to a good education.  Luz Andrea dreams with having a large workshop to generate employment for those most in need and that will allow her to provide her children with economic stability.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 29 years old, married, and has children.  Her mother also lives with her in Kampong Chhnang province. She works as a garment worker in the province, earning a salary of $80 per month. She has been engaged in this business for more than three years.

Due to the lack of capital to repair her house, Chan is requesting her first loan from HKL, which she will use to purchase zinc to tile her house. Through her effort and commitment, Chan hopes to provide her family with a good standard of living. In the future, she would like to own a convenience shop in her house and send all of her children to school to get an education.

loans.use: to purchase zinc to tile her house.

loans.name: Akmaljon

texts.ru: Акмалчон трудолюбивый и добрый семьянин. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием картошки и пшеницы. Также занимается скотоводством. На полученную прибыль он намерен отремонтировать свой дом. Акмалчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян картошки и скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Akmaljon is a hard-working and kind family man. His wife takes care of the household. For over 6 years, Akmaljon has been cultivating potatoes and wheat and raising livestock. He would like to obtain a loan to purchase potato seeds and cattle. Akmaljon is planning to use his profits to repair his home. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and cattle

loans.name: Luz Aide

texts.es:
Luz Aide es una persona que ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo sus ganas de trabajar han hecho que salga adelante y supere todas sus dificultades. Madre soltera cabeza de familia de su única hija de 5 años, es la encargada de todas las necesidades en su hogar, pues su esposo murió hace un tiempo dejándola a cargo de su hogar y de su hija. Con mucha fortaleza Luz Aide ha venido trabajando para poder ofrecer a su hija una buena calidad de vida, y desde su taller de confección ha logrado aumentar sus ventas y poder generar mayores ingresos. Gracias a que ha venido trabajando fuertemente, ha logrado aumentar la calidad de sus productos y de la misma manera ha logrado aumentar sus clientes; es por esto que ahora busca que un préstamo le permita comprar una máquina devastadora con la cual pueda ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes y así seguir aumentando sus ventas.

De esta manera su hija podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida gracias al aumento en sus ingresos, además de que podrá seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida y poco a poco ir cumpliendo su sueño de poder sacar su hija adelante.
texts.en:
Luz Aidé is a person who has had to go through many adversities in her life.  However, her will to work has allowed her to continue moving forward and overcome all her difficulties.  

She’s a single mother, head of household to her only daughter who is five years old.  She takes care of all her home’s needs because her husband died some time ago leaving her in charge of her home and her daughter.  

With much fortitude Luz Aidé has been working to offer her daughter a good quality of life and from her sewing shop has managed to increase sales and generate higher income.  Because she’s been working very hard, she’s managed to increase the quality of her products while also increasing the number of her customers and this is whys he’s now looking for a loan to buy a special sewing machine [to finish belts] so that she can offer better products to her customers and to continue increasing her sales.

In this way her daughter will have a better quality of life thanks to the increase in income and she will also be able to continue to have a good quality of life and gradually reach her dream of raising her daughter.

loans.use: to buy a special sewing machine.

loans.name: Blanca Edi

texts.es:
Blanca ha tenido que atravesar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, sus ganas de salir adelante le han permitido continuar progresando en su vida. Blanca es madre soltera de su único hijo, ya que su esposo murió hace aproximadamente 2 meses por diabetes, y desde entonces Blanca viene esforzándose en su negocio para brindar una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar. Tiene un negocio en la unidad deportiva de su ciudad, lo que le permite tener una cantidad de clientes fija que hacen que sus ventas sean buenas, y gracias a esto ha podido salir adelante en los últimos meses. Anteriormente trabajaba vendiendo chuzos en un carrito, pero debido a su edad y algunas enfermedades que la acompañan sus desplazamientos eran muy complicados, por lo que pudo conseguir un local donde ofrece a sus clientes snack, dulces, gaseosas, entre otros. Con el ánimo de surtir su negocio, Blanca busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de dulces, gaseosas y snack para su negocio y ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá ofrecer una mejor atención a sus clientes y así aumentarán sus ventas. Además, Blanca espera superar estos momentos de dificultad que ha tenido y seguir progresando junto a su hijo.
texts.en:
Blanca has had to go through a lot of adversity in her life.  Nevertheless, her desire to get ahead has allowed her to continue making progress in her life.

Blanca is a single mother of her only child because her husband died from diabetes approximately two months ago.  Since then Blanca has been making the effort in her business to give a better quality of life in her home.

She has a business in the sports center of her city, which gives her a number of steady customers who make her sales good.  Thanks to this she has been able to get ahead in the past few months.  Previously she was working selling grilled meat kebabs from a little cart, but her trips were very complicated because of her age and some illnesses she has.  This is why she was able to get a place where she sells her customers snacks, sweets, and sodas, among other things.

With the objective of stocking her business, Blanca is looking for a loan that gives her the opportunity to buy sweets, sodas, and snacks for her business, to offer her customers a greater variety of products.

In this way she will be able to give her customers better service and so her sales will increase.  In addition, Blanca hopes to improve these times of difficulty she has had and continue making progress along with her child.

loans.use: to buy sweets, sodas, and snacks for her business, to offer her customers a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Juliana Andrea

texts.es:
Juliana es una joven emprendedora que desde muy corta edad viene trabajando junto con su abuelo en el negocio del transporte de mercancía. Gracias a esto, desde muy temprana edad aprendió a conducir, y debido a la avanzada edad de su abuelo, desde los 16 años Juliana viene estando a cargo del negocio. En un principio fue muy difícil poder adaptarse al trabajo, pues las personas veían con muy malos ojos que una mujer condujera un camión y además de esto que sea tan joven, sin embargo, con mucho esfuerzo Juliana ha logrado superar estas adversidades y lograr continuar con su trabajo. Actualmente Juliana tiene 22 años y ha manifestado que su negocio le ha permitido poder culminar sus estudios y poder ofrecer en su hogar una contribución económica que permite que puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Debido a que su camión ya tiene mucho tiempo sin hacerle algún mantenimiento, Juliana busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de nueva cojinería para el vehículo y pintarlo para poder hacerle un mantenimiento y darle un mejor aspecto.

De esta manera su negocio podrá ser más atractivo para sus clientes y poder seguir aumentando sus ventas. Juliana sueña con tener un gran negocio y con poder tener una fuente de ingresos con la cual pueda progresar económicamente y con la cual su familia también pueda acceder a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juliana is a young entrepreneur who has been working from a very young age with her grandfather transporting merchandise.  Thanks to this, she learned to drive at a very young age and due to her grandfather’s advanced age she’s been running the business since she was 16 years old.

At the beginning it was very difficult to adapt to the work because people looked askance at a female truck driver and such a young one at that.  However, with much effort Juliana has managed to overcome these adversities and succeed in continuing with her work.

Currently Juliana is 22 years old and she tells us that her work has made it possible for her to complete her schooling and be able to contribute economically to her home so that they can have better quality of life.

Because the truck hasn’t had any upgrades in a long time Juliana is looking for a loan to buy new seating for it and to paint it as well as provide general in-depth service and give it a better appearance.

In this way her business will be more attractive to her customers and she will be able to continue to increase sales.  Juliana dreams with having a large business and to have a source of income with which to progress economically and that her family can access a better quality of life with.

loans.use: to buy new seats for the vehicle and to paint it.

loans.name: Sherzod

texts.ru: Шерзод добрый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 8 лет он занимается выращиванием картошки и купле- продажей скота, а более 20 лет занимается земледелием, его жена помогает ему, она трудолюбивая женщина. С полученной прибыли Шерзод намерен построить сарай для содержания овец. Шерзод хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, ядохимикатов и сырья. Он обращается в «ИМОН Интенешнл» впервые и в дальнейшем намерен быть постоянным клиентом организации.
texts.en: Sherzod is a kind and purpose-driven person. He is married and is raising three children. For the past 8 years, he has been growing potatoes and raising livestock. In total, Sherzod has been a farmer for over 20 years, with help from his hard-working wife. Sherzod would like to obtain a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers, pesticides, and other materials. He would like to use his profits to build a barn for keeping sheep. This is the first time Sherzod contacts IMON International and is planning to become their regular client.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 32 years old. She is married to a farmer in the village of Disimuray. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with three children, now school-aged. 

To provide for their daily needs, Imelda is busy managing their sari-sari store business. She has been doing this for over one year and earns about PHP 300 a day. At this time, Imelda wants to restock her store. She is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 10,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, curls, candies, oil and other kitchen needs to sell. Imelda is hoping that she can be able to continue sending her children in school and give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, curls, candies, oil and other kitchen needs to sell.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is a 33-year-old married woman who has been residing in Kampong Chhnang province. She is responsible for three school-aged children who depend on her support. Sok is involved in the agricultural business, mainly cultivating rice, especially in the rainy season. She has been in this business for many years. Also, she has dedicated herself to making ceramic pots and jars at home for additional income. Another part of the family income is provided by her husband, who sells firewood from a buffaloes-pulled trailer. 

In order to improve her farming business, Sok has applied for a loan through HKL to purchase an extra plot of land to enlarge her farm. Sok hopes that she will be able to increase her rice productivity as well as to develop her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase an extra plot of land to enlarge her farm.

loans.name: Soeurn

texts.en:
Soeurn is 40 years old and a loving mother of three single children, living in a peaceful village of Prey district, Kompong Cham province. She is a local farmer who particularly grows rice to generate a livelihood. She owns a few pieces of land, from which she can earn suitable income to provide enough sustenance for the whole family. Her husband and children help her to manage the business as well.

Soeurn has encountered difficulties in living because the area around her neighborhood often suffers from floods. She would like to take out a loan to purchase more dirt and soil to refill the land that was lost due to these floods. With the remaining funds, she will buy a young cow for her farm work. She is very happy and appreciative for the given funds that better her situation and further improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dirt and soil to refill the land that was lost due to floods.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба добрая и трудолюбивая женщина.Она замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Более 12 лет она занимается выпечкой и продажей национальных лепешек. Она отлично владеет секретами своего бизнеса. В бизнесе помогают муж и дети. Насиба хотела бы получить займ для покупки товаров и муки на выпечки лепешек.  Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Nasiba is a kind and hard-working woman. She is married and a loving mother of three children. For over 12 years, Nasiba has been baking and selling traditional flatbreads, and has fully mastered her craft's secrets. Her husband and children help with her business. Nasiba would like to obtain a loan to purchase flour and other ingredients for baking her flatbreads. She is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy flour

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es:
Jose se encuentra casado y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, es por esto que siempre trabaja fuertemente para poder brindar en su hogar todo lo necesario. Anteriormente Jose trabajaba vendiendo frutas y verduras en la plaza de mercado de su municipio, y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos su negocio llegó a crecer y a ser reconocido en el sector; sin embargo, por circunstancias adversas a su voluntad se vio en la obligación de cerrar su negocio y fue así como entonces abrió una tienda general desde su casa con la cual pudiera seguir generando los ingresos necesarios para su hogar. Jose abrió su tienda hace aproximadamente 2 años y hasta el momento ha logrado consolidarla en el sector y lograr atraer muy buenos clientes, sin embargo, debido a que su tienda fue montada con muy bajo capital, a veces encuentra dificultades para poder surtir su negocio. Es por esto que Jose busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para poder surtir su tienda y ofrecer así una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio podrá ser más atractivo para sus clientes y así sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente. Además, con mayores ingresos su esposa y sus 2 hijos podrán acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
José is married and has two children he’s always wanted to provide with a good quality of life and a good education.  This is why he always works hard to be able to provide everything his home needs.  José used to work selling fruit and vegetables in his town’s market square and thanks to the good quality of his products his business grew and become well-known in the sector.  However, due to circumstances beyond his control he was forced to close the business and this led to his opening a general store at home to continue generating income needed for his home.

José opened his store approximately 2 years ago and to date has managed to solidify it in the sector and acquire a good clientele.  However, because his store was set up with very little capital, he sometimes finds it difficult to stock it.  This is why José is looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy basic staple items to stock his store and offer a wider variety of products to his customers.

In this way his store will be more attractive to his customers and his sales will increase considerably.  In addition, with higher income his wife and two children will have access to a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: John Henry

texts.es:
John es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer ofrecer a su único hijo una buena calidad de vida. Desde hace aproximadamente 10 años tiene una tienda naturista donde ofrece una variedad de productos naturales, y la cual gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante. Con este negocio, el cual es su fuente de ingresos, le ha podido ofrecer a su hijo una buena calida de vida y una buena educación, por lo que sigue trabajando fuertemente para seguirlo sacando adelante y seguir teniendo buenos ingresos. Gracias a que últimamente ha tenido muy buenos pedidos de sus clientes, John busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de comprar productos naturales para ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos en su tienda naturista.

De esta manera sus clientes podrán seguir encontrando en su tienda una amplia gama de productos con lo que la tendrán como un referente en su municipio. Además, John podrá seguir ofreciendo en su hogar una buena calidad de vida y poco a poco ir cumpliendo su sueño de sacar su hijo adelante con una buena educación.
texts.en:
John has always been known as a very hard worker who wanted to give his son a good quality of life.  For approximately ten years he has been running a naturistic store, offering natural products, which has allowed him to get ahead.  Through this business, which is his source of income, he has been able to give his son a better lifestyle and a good education, so he continues to work hard to progress further and continue earning a good income.  Thanks to the very good orders he has been receiving from customers, John is seeking a loan to buy natural products to offer a wider variety of products at his naturist store.

This will allow him to continue offering a broad range of products which will make his store stand out in the municipality.  Likewise, John will be able to continue providing his household with a quality lifestyle and, little by little, reach his goal of providing a good education for his son.

loans.use: To buy natural products and add more variety.

loans.name: Shamim Akhtar's Group

texts.en:
Shamim Akhtar, aged 39-years, married with six children: four sons and two daughters. Shamim and her elder daughter are involved in the sewing business. Shamim gets orders from her community clients and she and her daughter both finish the orders on time. Shamim's remaining children are enrolled in a school and getting an education.  

Shamim’s husband operates a spare parts shop where he sells spare parts of motor vehicles to the customers, generating an income for the family. 
Shamim has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. He will invest the loan in buying spare parts in larger quantities to put in his shop. Shamim is very hopeful that the loan investment will bring better profits to her husband’s business and her family will be able to enjoy better living standards as a result.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for selling.

loans.name: Nhel

texts.en:
Nhel is a hard working mother who owns and manages a rice farming business to support her family. She is 49 years old and has eight children. Nhel has been a farmer for more than 22 years. Despite her hardships, she has the determination to work out her plans to achieve goal. Her priority is to provide a good education for her children, so they may have opportunities to get well-paid jobs someday. 

Due to the lack of a vehicle for home use, Nhel has decided to take a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase a motorcycle to satisfy her family’s needs. This will help her family to reduce some expenses on transportation. In the future, she hopes to expand and further develop her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to satisfy her family’s needs.

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es:
Jesus es una persona que gracias a sus ganas de trabajar ha logrado sacar su propio negocio adelante y consolidarlo entre sus clientes. Hace aproximadamente 3 años montó su negocio de fabricación de arepas rellenas de queso y este ha crecido en los últimos años de una manera considerable, hasta el punto que ahora puede generar un empleo para una persona muy necesitada y su familia también puede gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Jesus se encuentra separado y con el convive su único hijo, por lo que se esfuerza diariamente para poder tener en su hogar y brindarle a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, además de poder asegurarle un futuro económico estable y una educación universitaria. En su negocio ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes, los cuales le hacen grandes pedidos constantemente, y es por esto que Jesus busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de insumos para la fabricación de sus arepas como maíz, queso, harina, entre otros, y poder así preparar los grandes pedidos que han hecho sus clientes.

De esta manera su negocio seguirá creciendo y sus ingresos lo harán de la misma manera, pudiendo tener en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Jesús is a person who thanks to his work has managed to move his own business forward and consolidate it among his customers.  About three years ago he set up his own cheese stuffed ‘arepa’ [stuffed grilled corncakes] making business which has grown considerably in the last few years to such an extent that he can now generate employment for one person who is in need so that their family can also enjoy a better quality of life.

Jesús is separated and his only son lives with him so he works hard every day to have good quality at home for his son and to give him a good education as well as insure an economically stable future and a university education for him.

He’s managed to win over a large number of customers for his business who constantly place orders and this is why Jesús is looking for a loan that will allow him to buy ingredients he needs to make the arepas like corn, cheese and flour, among others, to be able to fill the large orders his customers have placed.

In this way his business will continue to grow as well as his income will in the same way thus having better quality of life and improved economic stability at home.

loans.use: to buy corn, chese and flour, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Fanny Magdalena

texts.es:
Fanny se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 12 años de edad a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida y una buena educación, y debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para poder garantizar una buena calidad de vida en su hogar, Fanny desea contribuir económicamente en su hogar montando su propio negocio. Fanny tiene experiencia de aproximadamente 6 años en las actividades de la agricultura, pues durante mucho tiempo viene colaborando a su esposo en estas actividades, y gracias a esta experiencia desea iniciar su propio negocio de cría y venta de ganado para generar ingresos adicionales que sean suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Fanny busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de teneros de levante para así poder iniciar su propio negocio.

De esta manera Fanny podrá ofrecer en su hogar una mejor calidad de vida y a sus hijos les brindará la posibilidad de acceder a una mejor educación. Además, sueña con poder tener un futuro económico estable y mayores oportunidades de progreso para su familia.
texts.en:
Fanny is married and has two children who are 9 and 12 years old that she’s always wanted to provide with a good quality of life and good education.  Because the income her husband generates is insufficient to guarantee a good quality of life in her home, Fanny wants to contribute economically to her home by setting up her own business.  

Fanny has about six years’ experience in agriculture because she’s been helping her husband for a long time in this type of activity and thanks to this experience she wants to start her own cattle raising business to generate additional income to help support her home.  Fanny is looking for a loan to buy pasture land to start her own business.

In this way Fanny will be able to provide better quality of life for her home and her children will have the possibility of accessing a better education.  In addition, she dreams with having a stable economic future and better opportunities for her family’s progress.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Jeison

texts.es:
Jeison es un joven emprendedor que decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos y contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Hace aproximadamente 5 meses montó su propio negocio el cual es una venta de prendas de vestir, las cuales ofrece principalmente a familiares, amigos y vecinos; de esta manera genera ingresos con los cuales contribuye económicamente en su hogar y se puede sostener sus propios gastos. Gracias a que ha tenido muy buenas ventas y su negocio fue montado con muy bajo capital, Jeison busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir para aumentar su surtido y poder responder a todos los pedidos de sus clientes.

De esta manera sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente y podrá ofrecer en su hogar mayores ingresos para aumentar su calidad de vida. Además, así podrá seguirse costeando sus propios gastos, aliviando la carga económica de sus padres y progresando económicamente.
texts.en:
Jeison is a young entrepreneur who decided to set up his own business in order to generate his own income and contribute economically to his household.  Approximately five months ago he started selling clothing, mainly to relatives, friends and neighbors, so he could make enough money to cover his own expenses.  With very little capital he has been able to reach a good sales volume.  Jeison is requesting a loan to buy more clothing to increase his inventory and fill orders.

This will increase sales considerably so he can contribute more income to the household for a better lifestyle.  Also, he will be able to cover his own expenses and be less of an economic burden on his parents, so they can get ahead.

loans.use: To buy clothing to increase his stock and fill orders.

loans.name: Blanca Elida

texts.es:
Blanca es una persona muy trabajadora que ha luchado fuertemente en su vida con el ánimo de sacar su familia adelante. Casada y con 4 hijos, siempre ha buscado una manera de poder ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, es por esto que al ver que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar ingresos adicionales para su familia. Gracias a que una amiga le enseñó la actividad, hace 3 años viene ofreciendo a sus clientes productos de uso personal, y con este negocio ha logrado captar una gran cantidad de clientes y así mismo unas muy buenas ventas. Gracias sus buenos productos ha logrado tener muy buenos pedidos, y ahora busca poder ofrecer sus productos desde su casa y poderlos exhibir de una buena manera, es por esto que Blanca busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una vitrina, productos de uso personal para poderla surtir y así ofrecer sus productos desde su casa y con una buena exhibición.

De esta manera podrá hacer más atractivo su negocio para los clientes, pues podrá estar más visible para las personas del sector que aún no conocen su negocio, generando mayores ingresos y por ende ofreciendo a su esposo y sus 4 hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Blanca is a very hardworking person who has striven mightily her entire life to move her family forward.  She’s married and has four children.  She’s always looked for ways to offer her family a better quality of life.  Because of this, noting that the income her husband generated was insufficient to cover all household expenses, she decided to start her own business to generate additional family income.

Thanks to a girlfriend who taught her the business she’s been selling personal use products for the last three years and has managed to capture a large number of customers which has meant very good sales.  Thanks to her good products she gets good orders and now she’s looking for a way to offer her products at home and to be able to display them properly.  Because of this, Blanca is looking for a loan to buy a display case and personal use products to stock it and to be able to sell her products from home and to display them well.

In this way she will be able to make her business more attractive to her customers because she will be more visible in the sector to people who are still unaware of her business generating higher income and thus offering her husband and her four children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a display case and personal use products.

loans.name: Ivan De Jesus

texts.es:
Ivan trabaja en la actividad de la carpintería hace varios años gracias a que inicialmente trabajaba para una empresa de estas características y gracias a su experiencia adquirida decidió abrir su propio taller de carpintería, con el cual genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Ivan ha venido trabajando fuertemente para aumentar sus ventas, y ahora se ha visto reflejado en grandes pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes; es por esto que busca que un préstamo le permita comprar materias primas como madera y pegantes para fabricar los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

De esta manera podrá seguir trabajando en su propio taller y seguir generando un puesto de trabajo para una persona necesitada. Además, espera que su taller siga creciendo para que su familia tenga la oportunidad de acceder a mejores recursos económicos y poder superar las grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida.
texts.en:
Ivan has been running a carpentry business for several years, thanks to the fact that he used to work for a company in this sector where he gained enough experience to open his own workshop.  He generates enough income to support his family, comprised of his wife and two children.  Ivan has been working hard to increase sales and now he has large orders to fill.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan to buy raw materials, such as wood and glue, to manufacturer the products ordered by his customers.

This will allow him to continue his carpentry business and generate employment for people in need of a job.  Also, he wants to expand his business so his family can have access to better economic resources in order to overcome the many adversities experienced in life.

loans.use: To buy raw materials, such as wood and glue, to fill customer orders.

loans.name: Zubaida's Group

texts.en:
Zubaida is married and has four children. Three of her children are getting their education while the fourth one is free and doesn’t do anything. 

Zubaida is a very talented business woman. She operates a livestock business. Zubaida's husband also helps to sell the livestock to the required customers. They operate their business from their home, where they deal with goats and sheep. They purchase young animals from the animal markets and sell them after raising them up. They have been operating this business for the last 8 years and have earned a good reputation among the customers.
 
Zubaida has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her livestock business. With the loan, she and her husband will buy animals (goats and sheep) for reselling. They are hopeful about the positive financial results from their business after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy animals (goats & sheep) for selling.

loans.name: Yon

texts.en: Yon is 28-year-old married woman who has been residing in Ang Snoul district, Kandal province. She has become a mother of two children. She owns a few pieces of land for a rice farming business. Also, she works as a sewing staff for a garment factory, earning her payment monthly. She has been in this business for more than 2 years. Yon wants to develop her living status, so she decided to request a loan to purchase a cow for farming purposes. She says that, in the next coming season, she won’t have to hire other animals to work on her farmland any longer. So, the purchase of the cow will help her to reduce some expenses as well. For her business goal, she wants to be a successful rice trader and hopes to provide her children with further education.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for farming purposes.

loans.name: Muniran

texts.en:
Muniran, 38, is married; her husband is a carpenter. They have four children who are studying. Her husband has a carpentry shop and she has asked for a loan to buy woods, nails and wooden polisher. He manufactures wooden baskets on his customer requests. He started the business 12 years ago. It was passed down from his father who taught him about this skill. The business is important because he earns income to support his family. His business is popular because he works only with good quality wood.  

Muniran is hopeful that her husband’s business will grow after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy required materials for a wooden baskets-making business.

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable que ha logrado superar grandes adversidades que le ha presentado la vida. Su padre trabajaba en un bar - billar el cual ella ayudaba a administrar en sus tiempos libres, pues trabajaba como operaria en una empresa de confecciones; cuando su padre murió ella quedó a cargo de su bar - billar y desde ese momento viene trabajando fuertemente en este para poderlo sacar adelante y seguir teniendo este como su fuente de ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Su bar - billar ya tenía una gran clientela fija gracias a que allí se venden algunas bebidas alcohólicas, por lo que sus clientes lo visitan constantemente. Debido a que su billar se ha venido deteriorando con el paso del tiempo, Margarita busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la reparación del billar de su negocio y poder seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes en el bar.

De esta manera podrá seguir teniendo las buenas ventas y así seguirá generando los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Además, espera que su negocio siga creciendo para ofrecer en su familia una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas.
texts.en:
Margarita’s a very hardworking, responsible person who has managed to overcome great adversities life has presented her.  Her father worked in a bar/billiard hall that she helped him run in her free time because she was an employee of a dressmaking firm.  When her father died she remained in charge of the bar/billiard hall and from that moment on has been working hard to move it forward and continue to have it as her source of income to contribute economically to her home.

Her bar/billiard hall has a steady clientele thanks to the sale there of some alcoholic beverages so her customers come by constantly.  Because the pool table has been deteriorating with the passage of time, Margarita is looking for a loan so that she can repair it and be able to continue to offer good customer service.

In this way she will be able to continue to have good sales and continue to generate income needed to support her home.  In addition, she hopes that her business will continue to grow to offer her family a good quality of life and greater economic opportunities.

loans.use: to repair the pool table.

loans.name: Chhon

texts.en:
Chhon, 46, is a resident from the Prey district, in Kompong Cham province. This province has the largest population because this area has rich, fertile land that enables local farmers to grow many types of crops, such as vegetables, fruit, rice, potatoes, peppers, beans, corn, and maize. Chhon and other villagers are dedicated to rice husbandry to support themselves. Chhon has been in this business for many years. Recently, she also owned and operated a business at a local market, selling beef along with her husband and earning approximately USD 2.00 per day.
Chhon is taking out a loan from Kiva through HKL to fix some parts of her house. She believes that she can improve her living situation by using the loan. This is her fourth cycle loan with HKL. She has a good background in paying back her loan punctually and regularly. She is very thankful for the great support to her family. She now lives with her husband and three children in a home in the province.

loans.use: to fix some parts of her house.

loans.name: Najma Naheed's Group

texts.en:
Najma Naheed, aged 42-years, is involved in a sewing clothes business. Her husband is a rickshaw driver, by profession, while her elder son works in a medical clinic. Her remaining four children are enrolled in a school and getting their education.  

Najma is a very talented lady. Her work is home based. She does this work to financially contribute to the family and to provide better education facilities to her children. She wishesto make the future brighter for her children by providing a good education. 


Najma has requested for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for improving her sewing business. She will invest the loan in buying thread, clothes, and scissors, etc. for her sewing business. This will enable her to sew better quality clothes for her customers and increase the income. She is hopeful that her business will be improved a lot after the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy required items for a sewing business.

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en: A 35-year-old married mother of two school-aged children, Flordeliza manages a sari-sari (community-based) store. This hardworking and loving mother is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy more snack foods, spices and drinks for her store in order to earn additional income to sustain the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy drinks, spices and snack foods for her store.

loans.name: Aura Luz

texts.es:
Aura es una persona muy trabajadora que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades en su vida, por lo que sus ganas de salir adelante han sido fundamentales para superar las dificultades y seguir progresando cada vez más. Aura se encuentra casada y tiene 6 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una buena calidad de vida, y es por esto que debido a que los ingresos de su esposo no son suficientes para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, decidió comenzar a trabajar como empleada doméstica para contribuir con los ingresos del hogar; posteriormente pasó a trabajar en una finca en las actividades de la agricultura, y cuando 2 de sus hijos comenzaron a trabajar le dieron un pequeño capital con el que montara un negocio desde su casa para poder que descansara un poco de tan arduos trabajos. Así fue como montó su tienda general donde ofrece principalmente productos de la canasta familiar y en la cual ha logrado tener muy buenos clientes. Sin embargo, debido a que su tienda fue montada con muy bajo capital, Aura no puede ofrecer una gran variedad de productos a sus clientes, y esto le ha venido trayendo algunas dificultades en su negocio, es por esto que Aura busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para poder surtir su tienda y ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos.

De esta manera su tienda será más atractiva para los clientes y así podrá aumentar sus ventas considerablemente. Además, con mayores ingresos su esposo y sus hijos tendrán acceso a una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Aura is a very hardworking person who has had to overcome great adversities in her life so her drive to get ahead has been fundamental to overcome the difficulties and continue making more progress each time.

Aura is married and has six children she’s always wanted to give a good quality of life to and this is why she decided to start to work as a domestic employee to contribute to household expenses when she noted that her husband’s income was insufficient to cover all household costs.  Later on she went to work as a laborer in farm chores at a large agricultural estate and when two of her children started to work they gave her a little capital so that she could open a home-based business so she could now rest a bit from the heavy toil.  

This is how she opened her general store where she sells mainly basic staple items and she’s managed to get very good customers.  However, because her store was set up with very little capital sometimes Aura is unable to offer her customers a very wide selection of products and this has created some difficulties for her business.  This is why Aura is looking for a loan to be able to buy basic staple items to stock her store an offer a wider variety of products to her customers.

In this way her store will be more attractive to her customers and her sales will increase considerably.  In addition, with more income her husband and her children will have access to a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic inherited her four hectares of rice farm land from her parents. She start running her agricultural business almost six years ago. She is a married woman who has four children. Two of her children goes to school while the eldest is out of school due to early pregnancy and the youngest is still infant-aged. Marivic's husband is an Overseas Filipino Workers (OFW). 

With the number of hectares of rice field she manages, Marivic has assigned care takers whom she trusts. Marivic struggles shortage of capital in improving her farm plot due to the high cost of basic commodities and increased household expenses. With regards to her situation, she is asking for financial support amounting to PHP50,000. She will utilize this loan amount to buy seeds and some amount will be used to pay for irrigation fees and land preparation for her farm plot. She hopes to obtain this requested loan amount in order to have productive rice fields. In this way, she can generate greater profits which will serve to cover all of her household expenditures and her children's education costs.

loans.use: to use in buying seeds and to pay for irrigation fees for agricultural business.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en: Alicia, from the village of San Ignacio, province of Isabela, is 46 years old, married, and the mother of four grown children. Selling a variety of products in her village, Alicia is a very patient woman who wants to expand her business. She is therefore requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy additional products to sell to earn more income. Alicia dreams that in the future she will see her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, drinks, spices and snack foods for her store.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en: Vicenta, 47 years old, believes that everything has a purpose. Engaged in a hog-raising business, Vicenta is married to Fernando, a farmer, and they have three children. Farming is the main source of income for their family, and she is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy both feed and additional piglets for her enterprise. She hopes that her business will expand so that she can meet all the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy feeds and additional piglets for her business.

loans.name: Mart

texts.en:
Mart, 52, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish paste for more than ten years, earning approximately USD 8 per day. Her husband is unemployed. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s living condition, Mart is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to raise capital in her business to purchase more fish paste to resell. By doing so, she will earn more profit to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to raise capital for her business to purchase more fish paste to resell.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en: A very diligent and hardworking mother, Norma manages a store where she sells different products in the people of their community. Norma is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional products such as snack foods, spices and drinks for her store, to have additional income to sustain the need of her family. In the future, Norma hopes that her business can expand so that she can sustain the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, spices and drinks for her store.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson, a 48 year old married man, lives peacefully at Baggao with her daughter. Nelson has two children, a nursing graduate who is looking for employment and a soldier. Nelson's wife works abroad. He is patiently involving himself in a corn farming business and livestock raising (pigs to fatten and breed). He was able to earn about PHP30,000 a month doing these activities. From his businesses, he has provided the best education for his children.

Nelson would like to keep earning good profits from the hog raising business, but he needs additional capital. He is now asking for a loan of PHP50,000 to buy vaccines, feed, and medicines for the piglets. This will help ensure good growth and sustainability. He is looking for the improvement of his businesses and to achieve financial stability so that his wife will not be having to work abroad anymore.

loans.use: to buy vaccines, feed, and medicines for the piglets.

loans.name: Ana Delfina

texts.es: La Señora Ana Delfina vive en la Aldea Palama en donde tiene  su vivienda tiene una hija de tres años  ella trabaja juntamente con su esposo apoyándolo en el café internet que tienen, cada día ella baja al pueblo en donde tienen su negocio es una mujer muy creativa y emprendedora  porque se dedica a ver y obtener  fondos para su familia; ella apoya a otras mujeres con sus ideas y las anima a trabajar es muy puntual en sus pagos y responsable lo que ella anhela es tener el negocio con su clientela y que su hija pueda estudiar quiere mejorar su estilo de vida y tener una casa bonita juntamente con su esposo agradece a Dios y a los que proveen los recursos para que mujeres como ella puedan salir adelante en sus actividades.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de equipo para su cafe Internet.
texts.en: Mrs. Ana Delfina lives in Palama Village with her three-year-old daughter and husband who runs an Internet cafe, where she also helps out.  Every day she goes down to the village to work.  She is a very creative, enterprising woman who strives to provide for her family while also encouraging other women to work by giving them ideas.  She is very punctual and responsible in her payments.  Her goal is to continue with her business in order to give her daughter a good education and a better lifestyle, and to have a nicer house with her husband.  She thanks God and the lenders who provide resources to women like her so they can get ahead.  She is requesting a loan to buy equipment for her Internet cafe.

loans.use: To buy equipment for her Internet cafe.

loans.name: Bhubut

texts.en:
Bhubut is managing his store selling agricultural supplies and livestock feed at San Jose. This makes him busy in his everyday life from 6am to 6pm. He has been in the business for almost three years. He is 31 years old and has one infant child. His wife is a public school teacher. 

Bhubut is now asking for a loan of PHP45,000 to add up his merchandise. He will buy three sacks of livestock feed and liters of pesticides and insecticides to sell. His business generates just enough income for the family's sustenance so he still wants to improve his sales. He also would like to keep extending good customer service to his customers. 

Someday, he hopes to earn funds to invest in a hog raising business for additional profits and to continue being a businessman.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of livestock feed and liters of pesticides and insecticides to sell.

loans.name: Yom

texts.en: Yom, 48, is widowed and resides with six children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker who receives support from her children. Four of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about USD12 per day. In order to improve her family’s economy, Yom is requesting a loan of USD 1500 to purchase a wedding tent and tables for rental. This purchase will enable her to earn extra income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase wedding tents and tables for rental.

loans.name: Bun Thoeurn

texts.en: Bun Thoeurn, 40, is married and resides with her husband and five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband runs the business of buying cattle for resale. He earns about 5 USD per day. One of her children is employed in a garment factory and earns about 3 USD per day. In order to improve her family’s living conditions, Bun Thoeurn is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to raise capital for her husband's cattle business. By doing so, he would earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a food store and help her children get their bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for resale

loans.name: Nhanh

texts.en:
Nhanh, age 30, resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling Khmer noodles for more than two years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about $5 per day. Nhanh wants to run an additional business in order to improve her family’s standard of living. 

Due to lack of funds, Nhanh is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase groceries to sell. This will enable her to earn extra income to support the family. 

In the future, Nhanh would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to sell.

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic is a businessman who lives in Annayatan with his wife and 3-year-old child. To earn a living, Dominic raises hogs to fatten and sell. He is also a rice retailer and he provides motorcycle transport services to the people in his village. 

Dominic would like to earn a good income from his businesses to meet his family's daily needs. He is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy gasoline and crude oil to use for his motorcycle transport business. He also uses his motorcycle to transport his merchandise to the nearby villages. 

In the future, Dominic hopes to became a successful entrepreneur and provide a better way of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and crude oil to use for his motorcycle transport business.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
At her age of 41, Loida is still single. She kiddingly said that she forgot to get married. Loida manages a sari-sari store business in their village. She is selling a variety of grocery items like biscuits, eggs, spices and curls. Her income from the business provides for her parents food and needs every day.

Loida wants to grow the business and be able to further bestow her parents needs. Loida is asking for a loan of PHP30,000 to purchase drinks, medicines, breads and canned goods. She believes that availing the loan will have a big help for her for the growth of the business. She is hoping that she will earn higher income as well.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, medicines, breads and canned goods.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер трудолюбивый и добрый человек, который женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Является собственником бизнеса и успешно продолжает его. Жена занимается дехканством. Начинал бизнес с одного скота, теперь увеличил поголовье. Алишер хотел бы получить займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Alisher is a hardworking and kind person, who is married and raising three children.  He has been involved in buying and selling cattle for over five years.  He is the owner of this business and runs it successfully.  His wife is involved in dekhan farm work.  Alisher started his business with one head of livestock and increased the headcount since then.  Alisher wants to obtain this loan to buy cattle in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.ru: Зулайхо замужем, мать троих детей. Дети несовершеннолетние. Муж занимается торговлей овощей. Зулайхо занимается торговлей тканей. У нее свой круг клиентов. Женщинам нравятся ткани, которые она привозит. Зулайхо хочет получить займ для приобретения новых тканей и пополнения ассортимента товаров. Она надеется в вашей помощи.
texts.en: Zulaykho is married and a mother of three children, all of whom are adolescent.  Her husband is involved in selling vegetables.  Zulaykho sells fabrics.  She has her own circle of clients.  Women like the fabrics that she brings in.  Zulaykho wants to obtain this loan to buy new fabrics and refill the selection of merchandise.  She relies on your help.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Duo La Montañita Group

texts.es:
DUO LA MONTAÑITA
La señora Delmi, ella es una mujer  trabajadora que cada dia se dedica a sus labores desde temprano hasta horas de la noche para apoyar a su esposo ya que son de escasos recursos económicos y  se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y también se dedica a la crianza de animales ya que tienen bajo su responsabilidad a dos menores de edad y que con el trabajo de ella tienen que salir adelante ya que su esposo es de escasos recursos y lo que gana no alcanza para los gastos de la familia, es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima,  Esta muy agradecida con KIVA porque ha sido de muchas bendiciones y de mucho beneficio y espera que a ella le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
DUO LA MONTAÑITA
“Duo La Montañita” (The Little Mountain Duo)

Delme is a hard-working woman.  She works from early until the night hours in order to support her husband.  She does this because financial resources are scarce.  She makes typical woven products by hand, and she also raises animals.  

They have two minor children for whom they are responsible.  They have to get ahead through her work because her husband has scarce resources.  What he earns does not cover the family’s expenses.

That is why she is requesting a loan to buy raw materials.  She is very grateful to Kiva because it has provided many blessings and been of great benefit.  

She hopes that you are able to help with the loan she is requesting.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for weaving.

loans.name: Duo Shama Group

texts.es:
DUO SHAMA
